question: I want to learn coding, where do I start?

answer.text: That’s great to hear you’re interested in learning how to code! We know it can be overwhelming when you are just starting out. [The Getting Started Guide](/get-started) is here to walk you through everything you need to know to board the Coding Train!! You can also jump right into the [Code! Programming with p5.js](/tracks/code-programming-with-p5-js) beginner track.
